gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: SOERE OLA : Data from the Observatory on LAkes for Annecy Lake

gmd:textGroup.gmd:LocalisedCharacterString: SOERE OLA : Data from the Observatory on LAkes for Annecy Lake
SOERE OLA : Données de l'Observatoire des LAcs concernant le lac d'Annecy

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: Data obtained from the INRA CARRTEL laboratory in Thonon-les-Bains (SOERE-OLA: Observation and Experimental Systems for Environmental Research - LAke Observatory) in collaboration with SILA (Intercommunal Syndicate of Lake Annecy) Manager of the lake. These data cover different topics: The variables of the physico-chemistry theme are: nitrogen, calcium, carbon, chlorides, conductivity, magnesium, dissolved oxygen, pH, phosphorus, potassium, reactive silica, sodium, sulphate, temperature, complete alkalimetric titre. Data taken at various depths throughout the lake's water column. The water column is made at the deepest point of the lake (65m). The samples are taken every 15 days. Without being continuous the period concerns a follow-up from the years 1965 to the present day (Absence of data between 1982 and May 1990). The variables of the chlorophyll theme are: chlorophyll a strickland-parsons, chlorophyll c, carotenoids, chlorophyll a scor-unesco, pheopigments. The variables of the topic sampling conditions are: air temperature, cloudiness, sunshine, weather, wind direction, wind speed, atmospheric pressure, water aspect, surface condition, transparency, color of water. The variables of the phytoplankton theme are: determiner name, sedimented volume, counting surface, determined taxon, number of counted fields, number of objects counted, number of objects per ml, number of cells per ml, biovolume of species In the sample. The variables of the primary production theme are: duration of incubation, primary production by actual incubation duration, primary production per hour, primary production by median third. The variables of the probe theme are: depth, temperature, chlorophyll a, pH conductivity, oxygen, oxygen saturation rate, turbidity, transparency, by w, by a, pc. The variables of the zooplankton theme are: name of the determiner, sedimented biovolume, name of the taxon determined, stage of development, number of individuals.

gmd:textGroup.gmd:LocalisedCharacterString: Data obtained from the INRA CARRTEL laboratory in Thonon-les-Bains (SOERE-OLA: Observation and Experimental Systems for Environmental Research - LAke Observatory) in collaboration with SILA (Intercommunal Syndicate of Lake Annecy) Manager of the lake. These data cover different topics: The variables of the physico-chemistry theme are: nitrogen, calcium, carbon, chlorides, conductivity, magnesium, dissolved oxygen, pH, phosphorus, potassium, reactive silica, sodium, sulphate, temperature, complete alkalimetric titre. Data taken at various depths throughout the lake's water column. The water column is made at the deepest point of the lake (65m). The samples are taken every 15 days. Without being continuous the period concerns a follow-up from the years 1965 to the present day (Absence of data between 1982 and May 1990). The variables of the chlorophyll theme are: chlorophyll a strickland-parsons, chlorophyll c, carotenoids, chlorophyll a scor-unesco, pheopigments. The variables of the topic sampling conditions are: air temperature, cloudiness, sunshine, weather, wind direction, wind speed, atmospheric pressure, water aspect, surface condition, transparency, color of water. The variables of the phytoplankton theme are: determiner name, sedimented volume, counting surface, determined taxon, number of counted fields, number of objects counted, number of objects per ml, number of cells per ml, biovolume of species In the sample. The variables of the primary production theme are: duration of incubation, primary production by actual incubation duration, primary production per hour, primary production by median third. The variables of the probe theme are: depth, temperature, chlorophyll a, pH conductivity, oxygen, oxygen saturation rate, turbidity, transparency, by w, by a, pc. The variables of the zooplankton theme are: name of the determiner, sedimented biovolume, name of the taxon determined, stage of development, number of individuals.

Données issues du laboratoire INRA CARRTEL de Thonon-les-Bains (SOERE-OLA : Systèmes d'Observation et d'Expérimentation pour la Recherche en Environnement - Observatoire des LAcs) en collaboration avec le SILA (Syndicat Intercommunal du Lac d'Annecy), gestionnaire du lac. Ces données concernent différents thèmes : Les variables du thème physico-chimie sont : azote, calcium, carbone, chlorures, conductivité, magnésium, oxygène dissous, pH, phosphore, potassium, silice réactive, sodium, sulfate, température, titre alcalimétrique complet. Données prélevées à différentes profondeurs sur toute la colonne d'eau du lac. La colonne d'eau est faite au point le plus profond du lac (65m). Les prélèvements sont effectués tous les 15 jours. Sans être continue la période concerne un suivi depuis les années 1965 jusqu'à nos jours (Absence de données entre 1982 et mai 1990). Les variables du thème chlorophylle sont : chlorophylle a strickland-parsons, chlorophylle c, caroténoïdes, chlorophylle a scor-unesco, phéopigments. Les variables du thème conditions de prélèvements sont : température de l'air, nébulosité, ensoleillement, temps, direction du vent, vitesse du vent, pression atmosphérique, aspect de l'eau, état de surface, transparence, couleur de l'eau. Les variables du thème phytoplancton sont : nom du déterminateur, volume sédimenté, surface de comptage, taxon déterminé, nombre de champs comptés, nombre d'objets comptés, nombre d'objets par ml, nombre de cellules par ml, biovolume de l'espèce dans l'échantillon. Les variables du thème production primaire sont : durée d'incubation, production primaire par durée d'incubation réelle, production primaire par heure, production primaire par tiers médian. Les variables du thème sondes sont : profondeur, température, chlorophylle a, pH conductivité, oxygène, taux de saturation en oxygène, turbidité, transparence, par w, par a, pc. Les variables du thème zooplancton sont : nom du déterminateur, biovolume sédimenté, nom du taxon déterminé, stade de développement, nombre d'individus.

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Commission Regulation (EU) No 1089/2010 of 23 November 2010 implementing Directive 2007/2/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards interoperability of spatial data sets and services

gmd:textGroup.gmd:LocalisedCharacterString: Commission Regulation (EU) No 1089/2010 of 23 November 2010 implementing Directive 2007/2/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards interoperability of spatial data sets and services

gmd:statement.gco:CharacterString: The data temporal extents are depending on parameters. Older data are physical chemistry from 1957 on Lake Geneva. They have been validated by scientists when they are been acquired but were transcribed from their paper version to a digital version thereafter. The SOERE OLA is a service of AnaEE-France Infrastructure.

gmd:textGroup.gmd:LocalisedCharacterString: The data temporal extents are depending on parameters. Older data are physical chemistry from 1957 on Lake Geneva. They have been validated by scientists when they are been acquired but were transcribed from their paper version to a digital version thereafter. The SOERE OLA is a service of AnaEE-France Infrastructure.

Les données sont sur des étendues temporelles variables selon leur type. Les plus anciennes sont des données de physico chimie à partir de 1957 concernant le lac Léman Elles ont été validées par des scientifiques au fur et à mesure de leur acquisition puis retranscrites de leur version papier vers une version numérique par la suite. Le SOERE OLA est un des services de l'infrastructure AnaEE-France.
